footer.tagline: Your reliable partner in real estate in Chernivtsi

descriptions.apartment: Spacious and bright apartment with modern renovation. Convenient location in the city center, near parks, schools and shops. Individual heating, air conditioning, furniture and appliances included in the price.
descriptions.house: Luxurious cottage with its own pool and well-maintained area. Panoramic windows, terrace for relaxation, garage for 2 cars. High-quality materials and modern life support systems.
descriptions.commercial: Premises with quality renovation and convenient location. High pedestrian traffic, separate entrance, all utilities. Perfect for business of any format.

buyingProcess.question: How long does the property buying process usually take?
buyingProcess.answer: The average time from beginning your search to signing a purchase agreement is 2-3 weeks. We work as efficiently as possible to save your time.

mortgage.question: What documents are needed to apply for a mortgage?
mortgage.answer: For a mortgage application, you'll need a passport, tax ID, income certificate, and bank statement showing transactions for the last 6 months. Our experts will help you gather all necessary documents.

commission.question: What commission do you charge for your services?
commission.answer: Our commissions depend on the type of operation and complexity of the deal. We offer a transparent pricing system and discuss all details at the beginning of our cooperation.

onlineRent.question: Is it possible to arrange a rental online?
onlineRent.answer: Yes, we provide the option for remote rental arrangements. All documents can be signed electronically, and property viewings can be conducted via video call.

placeholders.apartments: Looking for a 2-bedroom apartment in the center?
placeholders.house: Dreaming of a house with a pool?
placeholders.rent: Want to rent near the subway?

hero.text: Your new apartment is closer than you think

buy.title: Buying
buy.description: Get access to the lowest prices in the real estate market. We offer the opportunity to make your own offer and help you arrange a mortgage under the favorable ЄОселя program.

sell.title: Selling
sell.description: Our experts will find a buyer faster than you can take your first step. We use advanced marketing techniques and a wide base of potential clients.

rent.title: Rental
rent.description: Quick search for housing for individuals and business premises. We offer a full range of real estate rental services taking into account your needs.
